```{r}
fri <- as.Date("2018-09-24")


advdate <- function(obj, adv) {
 tmon <- obj + 7*(adv-1)
 tfri <- obj + 4 + 7*(adv-0)
 tmon <- format(tmon, format="%m/%d")
 tfri <- format(tfri, format="%m/%d")
 zadv <- sprintf("%02d", adv)
 if(adv == 11) {
   tmp <- paste("Finals Week",sep='',", ", tmon, "-" ,tfri)
 } else {
   tmp <- paste("Week ",zadv,sep='',", ", tfri)
 }
 return(tmp)
}

```
